resources.string: By proceeding, you confirm you accept Kavach’s Agreement & Privacy Policy
Exponentially increasing frauds with hyper growth in digitization
More than 1000cr lost to frauds last year
1 out of 4 are victims of a fraud
Frauds are no longer limited to insecure websites or virus attacks. We will warn you if we detect anything suspicious/fraudulent which can be an app or a website or a link and much more

Kavach is against showing ads even though it can help us sustain(and maybe a lot more) as we believe privacy is a right all of us ought to have and even more so in the digital world. We don’t want to add yet another tracker cookie for ads to be shown and instead want to help you delete and stop other from tracking you incessantly.
We have the following subscriptions to help us sustain the infrastructure needed and provide you the best shield of digital fraud protection keeping up with sophisticated fraudsters.
Introductory offer of free additional protections released in the next 3 months
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed erat nulla...
Open Accessibility Settings by tapping the below button.
Tap Installed Apps or Installed services and Select Kavach Digital Protection.
Tap the toggle to give us permission.

By allowing a part of the accessibility permission, you permit Kavach to scan the URl’s visited in real time only. We will not be storing any personal information and will not be tracking any usage. No data will be shared with any 3rd party and we are fully complaint with the security and privacy guidelines.
Use Kavach Digital Fraud Shield Shortcut

Kavach uses a part of the Android Accessibility Service to check the URL’s clicked on real time. This can protect you from the rising frauds while feeling safe that no personal information is collected or tracked.

Kavach will only use the accessibility service to scan the URL in a browser real time while browsing, shopping or banking. It cannot view or control your screen at any point as the default notification of android may show. Please check our privacy policy and more detail on permission accessed on our website.
Need limited permission to protect you
